references: A. Fletcher, J. C. P. Miller, L. Rosenhead and L. J. Comrie, An Index of Mathematical Tables. Vols. 1 and 2, 2nd ed., Blackwell, Oxford and Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1962, Vol. 1, p. 112.

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (14,-49,36).
formula: a(n) = 1/24 - 4^(n+2)/15 + 9^(n+2)/40. [From _Antonio Alberto Olivares_, Feb 03 2010]a(n) = 13*a(n-1) -36*a(n-2)+1, n>=2. - Vincenzo Librandi, Mar 23 2011
maple: a:=n->sum((9^(n-j)-4^(n-j))/5,j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=1..18); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 15 2007A002451:=-1/(z-1)/(4*z-1)/(9*z-1); [_Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.]
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1/((1 - x) (1 - 4 x) (1 - 9 x)), {x, 0, 25}], x] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 20 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
